class.name: UtilityAICustomSearchCriterion
class.brief_description: Defines a method [code]apply_criterion()[/code] that will be called to execute the filtering.
class.description: With the custom search criterion you can define a method [code]apply_criterion()[/code] that will be called to execute the filtering. You need to set the [member UtilityAINQSSearchCriteria.is_filtered] and [member UtilityAINQSSearchCriteria.score] properties in the method.
